summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Smart Daily Planner application. All core functionality working correctly including navigation flow, interactive elements, data persistence, responsive design, and design guidelines compliance.

ui_bugs.issue: Button click intercepted by emergent-badge overlay element
ui_bugs.workaround: Force click bypasses the issue successfully

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and feature cards
Navigation flow: Landing → Goal Setup → Task Input → Dashboard → Analytics
Main goal selection and custom goal input
Task input with title, duration slider, and priority selection
Task list display and removal functionality
Generate AI Schedule navigation to dashboard
Dashboard progress bar and task completion tracking
AI chat panel with message input and mock responses
Analytics page with stat cards, charts, and achievements
Responsive design across desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports
Design guidelines compliance (Calm Blue theme, rounded corners, typography)
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
